row.process:
:SET &BEA_BESCHREIBUNG# = 'KSMDyn_Bearb' :SET &KSM_USER# = '&KSM_USER#' :SET &PROGRAMMTYP# = '330' :SET &VERTRAEGE# = 'J' :SET &TERMINE_IMS# = 'J' :SET &BRIEFE_CTV# = 'N' :SET &PROGRAM# = '&PROG_LC#' :SET &INIFILE# = '&PROGRAM#.ini' :SET &OPTIONS# = '&INIFILE#' :SET &LOGFILE# = '&LOGDIR#/&BEA_BESCHREIBUNG#.log' :SET &OUTFILE# = '&WORKDIR#/&PROGRAM#_&TS#.out' :SET &INPUTFILE# = '&WORKDIR#/nb42p800_&TS#.out'
! INI-FILE erstellen cat << __EOF__ |tee &RUNDIR#/&INIFILE#
BEARBEITER = &PROGRAMMTYP# BESCHREIBUNG = &BEA_BESCHREIBUNG# INPUTFILE = &INPUTFILE# LOGFILE = &LOGFILE# OUTFILE = &OUTFILE# TRACE = &TRACE# KSM_USER = &KSM_USER# KSMWSSST = &GEVO# PROT_VTR_FILTER = &PROT_VTR_FILTER_BEA# PROT_MSG_TYPE = &PROT_MSG_TYPE_BEA# TERMINE = &TERMINE_IMS# VERTRAEGE = &VERTRAEGE# BRIEFE = &BRIEFE_CTV# __EOF__
:INC JOBI.STANDARDJOB
